summary: AN ORDINANCE abolishing inactive boards and commissions of the City, namely the Seattle Parking Commission, SMC 3.62: the Public Reinvestment Review Board, SMC 3.42; and the Citizen's Housing Board, SMC ss 22.202.040, 22.202.050, 22.202.060, 22.202.070 by repealing those sections of the Municipal Code; and by repealing Resolution 24807 regarding the Crime Prevention Advisory Commission.
